title: Something in Common!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>It feels so good~~! I didn’t know being surrounded by the ocean could feel this good! Thank you for letting me ride on your boat, Kanan-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s nothing~. But again, is this really how you want me to thank you for accompanying me on the trail run?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s not nothing! This is really amazing! I’m from Switzerland, right? Switzerland doesn’t have an ocean. That’s why I’ve always wanted to be in a place like this where it’s just the open sea everywhere you look.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahahaha, I guess it would be very unusual for you. Ah, that’s right, use this. This time of the year is quite cold, isn’t it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waaah, the blanket is so warm~. With this, I really want to watch the ocean forever.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah. It’s the same view as far as the eye can see, but somehow I never get tired of it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Doesn’t it just look so but not exactly the same? It’s like how on idol lives, even if they sing the same song every time, you’ll find a different charm to them, you know? The ocean is probably also like that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You might be right! Even if people sing the same song, there will always be a difference, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I guess the ocean has the same charm point as school idols~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, looks like I found yet another reason to love the sea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
